crop.description: If true, allow user to crop the image (only for non svg)

square.description: Width must be equal to height or crop must allow only square as shape

jsonData.description: Data to be sent as parsable string, can contain special placeholder. E. g. '{"subject1": "${data.subject}", "options1": {"host": "${data.host}"}}'

data.description: Data to be sent as JSON.

encrypted.description: Is value encrypted or not (of course only for texts)

repeat.description: Password must be compared with password

visible.description: True if allow to view the password by toggling the view button

component.description: Component name that will be provided via props, like componentInstancesEditor

freeSolo.description: Set freeSolo to true so the textbox can contain any arbitrary value.

options.description: Options which can be completed. ["value1", "value2", ...] or [{"value": "value", "label": "Value1"}, "value2", ...]

trim.description: If text must be trimmed or not (default = true)

noDelete.description: If delete or add disabled, If noDelete is false, add, delete and move up/down should work

pattern.description: Read-only field with pattern like 'https://${data.ip}:${data.port}' (will not be saved in config)

okText.description: Alert that will be shown by pressing the button

types.description: Array of possible types: ['channel', 'device', ...] (has only state by default)

sm.description: Width in 1/12 of screen on small screen

md.description: width in 1/12 of screen on middle screens

lg.description: width in 1/12 of screen on large screens

xs.description: width in 1/12 of screen on very small screens

newLine.description: Should be shown from new line

hidden.description: JS function that could use 'native.attribute' for calculation

hideOnlyControl.description: If hidden the place will be shown, but no control

disabled.description: JS function that could use 'native.attribute' for calculation

style.description: css style in react notation: 'radiusBorder' and not 'radius-border'

validator.description: JS function: true no error, false - error

defaultFunc.description: JS function to calculate default value

noTranslation.description: Do not translate selects or other options (not for help, label or placeholder)

condition.description: JS function: true show confirm dialog

alsoDependsOn.description: Trigger confirm dialog if on of the components changed.
